task.title: Fix Miswired Connections
task.shortdesc: Identify and correct wiring errors by comparing your guitar's connections to a wiring diagram.

prereq.p: You need your guitar's wiring diagram and a soldering iron heated to 650-700Â°F.

step.cmd: Compare each connection in your guitar to the wiring diagram to identify any mismatched wires or reversed lugs.
step.stepresult: Incorrect connections show wires attached to different terminals than shown in the diagram.

step.cmd: Desolder and re-route any wires connected to incorrect locations.

taskbody.result: If sound is restored after correcting the wiring, miswired connections caused the problem.
